fields.health_warning: GOVERNMENT WARNING: (1) ACCORDING TO THE SURGEON GENERAL, WOMEN SHOULD NOT DRINK ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES DURING PREGNANCY BECAUSE OF THE RISK OF BIRTH DEFECTS. (2) CONSUMPTION OF ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES IMPAIRS YOUR ABILITY TO DRIVE A CAR OR OPERATE MACHINERY, AND MAY CAUSE HEALTH PROBLEMS.
fields.name_and_address: Cooper Ridge Vineyard 1389 Old Garden Valley Road, Roseburg, Oregon

fieldDetails.reasoning: Large prominent brand text at top of front label: "COOPER RIDGE".
The varietal/class is printed prominently as "MALBEC" on both front and back labels.
Back label small print shows the alcohol statement: "Alc. 13% by Vol." (appears next to the net contents).
Back label lists container size as "750 ml" next to the alcohol content.

fieldDetails.reasoning: Back label lists the producer name and street/city/state address in the block: "Cooper Ridge Vineyard 1389 Old Garden Valley Road, Roseburg, Oregon" (appears after the qualifying phrase).
Back label begins the name/address block with the qualifying phrase "Grown, Produced & Bottled by" before the producer name.
The wine varietal is stated clearly as "MALBEC" on both front and back labels.
Front label lists the appellation in all caps as "UMPQUA VALLEY, OREGON."
Back label includes the sulfite declaration text "Contains Sulfites."
Front label includes the vineyard/designation "FOX HOLLOW VINEYARD" beneath the varietal; this may serve as a fanciful/vineyard name.
No explicit country-of-origin or "Product of ..." statement is visible on the label images.
The vintage year "2022" appears prominently on both front and back labels.
No statement regarding standards of fill is visible on the provided label images.
